# CodeRef Ecosystem - Complete Document Type Inventory

**Purpose:** Comprehensive inventory of all document types across the CodeRef ecosystem to establish UDS (Universal Documentation Standards)

**Date:** 2026-01-10

**Scope:** All 6 MCP servers + coderef orchestrator

---

## Document Categories

### Category 1: Foundation Docs (Generated by coderef-docs)

**Purpose:** Core technical documentation auto-generated from codebase

**Generated By:** coderef-docs MCP server

**Document Types:**

1. **README.md**
   - **Location:** Project root
   - **Purpose:** Project overview, quick start, installation
   - **Current Frontmatter:** UDS (workorder_id, generated_by, feature_id, timestamp, title, version, status, doc_type)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/README.md`, `papertrail/README.md`

2. **ARCHITECTURE.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/foundation-docs/`
   - **Purpose:** System architecture, components, design decisions
   - **Current Frontmatter:** UDS (same as README)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/foundation-docs/ARCHITECTURE.md`

3. **API.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/foundation-docs/`
   - **Purpose:** API reference, endpoints, tool handlers
   - **Current Frontmatter:** UDS (same as README)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/foundation-docs/API.md`

4. **SCHEMA.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/foundation-docs/`
   - **Purpose:** Data models, JSON schemas, validation rules
   - **Current Frontmatter:** UDS (same as README)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/foundation-docs/SCHEMA.md`

5. **COMPONENTS.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/foundation-docs/`
   - **Purpose:** Component library, module inventory
   - **Current Frontmatter:** UDS (same as README)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/foundation-docs/COMPONENTS.md`

**Characteristics:**
- Auto-generated by coderef-docs
- POWER framework structure (Purpose, Overview, What/Why/When, Examples, References)
- Include UDS workorder tracking
- Version controlled

---

### Category 2: Workorder Docs (Created by coderef-workflow)

**Purpose:** Feature planning and execution tracking

**Generated By:** coderef-workflow MCP server + agents

**Document Types:**

1. **context.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/context.json`
   - **Purpose:** Requirements, constraints, decisions gathered during planning
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** Custom (has _uds and _metadata sections)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/coderef/workorder/coderef-context-integration/context.json`

2. **analysis.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/analysis.json`
   - **Purpose:** Project analysis from .coderef/ structure
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** Custom (has _uds and _metadata sections)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/coderef/workorder/coderef-context-integration/analysis.json`

3. **plan.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/plan.json`
   - **Purpose:** 10-section implementation plan
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** `schemas/planning/plan.schema.json`
   - **Validator:** ‚úÖ `validators/plans/validate.py`
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/coderef/workorder/coderef-context-integration/plan.json`

4. **execution-log.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/execution-log.json`
   - **Purpose:** Task execution history, timestamps, status changes
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** Custom
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/coderef/workorder/resource-sheet-p1-batch/execution-log.json`

5. **DELIVERABLES.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/DELIVERABLES.md`
   - **Purpose:** Final metrics, completion status, commit history
   - **Format:** Markdown
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/workorder/resource-sheet-metadata/DELIVERABLES.md`

**Characteristics:**
- Created during /create-workorder workflow
- Linked by workorder_id
- Track feature lifecycle
- Some have _uds metadata sections

---

### Category 3: Resource Sheets (Architectural Documentation)

**Purpose:** Authoritative technical reference for components, services, systems

**Created By:** Agents (manually or via /create-resource-sheet)

**Document Types:**

1. **{Component}-RESOURCE-SHEET.md**
   - **Location:** `docs/`, `coderef/resource/`
   - **Purpose:** Component architecture, state ownership, contracts
   - **Format:** Markdown
   - **Current Frontmatter:** RSMS v2.0 (agent, date, task, subject, parent_project, category, version, related_files, related_docs)
   - **Validator:** ‚úÖ `validators/resource-sheets/validate.ps1`
   - **Schema:** `schemas/documentation/resource-sheet-metadata-schema.json`
   - **Example:** `papertrail/docs/PAPERTRAIL-SERVER-RESOURCE-SHEET.md`

**Characteristics:**
- Naming convention: `{ComponentName}-RESOURCE-SHEET.md`
- RSMS v2.0 compliance (snake_case fields)
- UDS section headers (Executive Summary, Audience & Intent, Quick Reference)
- Refactor-safe contracts

---

### Category 4: Standards Documents

**Purpose:** Define coding standards, documentation standards, patterns

**Created By:** Manual documentation process

**Document Types:**

1. **global-documentation-standards.md**
   - **Location:** `standards/documentation/`
   - **Purpose:** Universal frontmatter requirements, footer format, no emojis
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None (should have!)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/standards/documentation/global-documentation-standards.md`

2. **resource-sheet-standards.md**
   - **Location:** `standards/documentation/`
   - **Purpose:** RSMS v2.0 specification
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/standards/documentation/resource-sheet-standards.md`

3. **script-frontmatter-standards.md**
   - **Location:** `standards/documentation/`
   - **Purpose:** Script/test frontmatter specification
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/standards/documentation/script-frontmatter-standards.md`

4. **CODING-STANDARDS.md** (various names)
   - **Location:** Project root or `docs/`
   - **Purpose:** Code style, patterns, conventions
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Various across projects

**Characteristics:**
- Define the rules for other documents
- Should follow their own standards
- Currently lack frontmatter (ironic!)

---

### Category 5: User-Facing Docs

**Purpose:** User guides, tutorials, how-tos for end users

**Created By:** Manual documentation process

**Document Types:**

1. **USER-GUIDE.md**
   - **Location:** `docs/` or project root
   - **Purpose:** End-user documentation, tutorials
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Missing in most projects (identified as gap)

2. **TUTORIAL-*.md**
   - **Location:** `docs/tutorials/`
   - **Purpose:** Step-by-step guides
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Rare in CodeRef ecosystem

3. **HOW-TO-*.md**
   - **Location:** `docs/how-to/`
   - **Purpose:** Task-specific guides
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Rare in CodeRef ecosystem

**Characteristics:**
- Written for non-technical users
- Task-oriented
- Should have simple frontmatter (agent, date, task)

---

### Category 6: System Docs (CLAUDE.md, etc.)

**Purpose:** AI agent instructions, system architecture overviews

**Created By:** Manual documentation process + agents

**Document Types:**

1. **CLAUDE.md**
   - **Location:** Project root
   - **Purpose:** AI context documentation, project overview for agents
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None (should have!)
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/CLAUDE.md`, `coderef-workflow/CLAUDE.md`

2. **SESSION-INDEX.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/sessions/`
   - **Purpose:** Multi-agent session tracking
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef/sessions/SESSION-INDEX.md`

3. **WORKORDER-LOG.txt** (not markdown)
   - **Location:** `coderef/`
   - **Purpose:** Append-only workorder audit trail
   - **Format:** Plain text
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-workflow/coderef/workorder-log.txt`

**Characteristics:**
- Critical for agent operation
- High importance
- Should have UDS frontmatter

---

### Category 7: Session Docs

**Purpose:** Multi-agent coordination

**Created By:** coderef orchestrator + /create-session

**Document Types:**

1. **communication.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/sessions/{session}/communication.json`
   - **Purpose:** Agent roster, status tracking
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** `schemas/sessions/communication-schema.json`
   - **Validator:** ‚úÖ `validators/sessions/validate.ps1`
   - **Example:** `coderef/sessions/papertrail-consolidation-audit/communication.json`

2. **instructions.json**
   - **Location:** `coderef/sessions/{session}/instructions.json`
   - **Purpose:** Task instructions for orchestrator and agents
   - **Format:** JSON
   - **Schema:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Various session directories

**Characteristics:**
- Multi-agent coordination
- JSON format (not markdown)
- communication.json fully validated

---

### Category 8: Migration/Audit Docs

**Purpose:** One-time migration guides, audit reports

**Created By:** Agents during specific workorders

**Document Types:**

1. **MIGRATION-*.md**
   - **Location:** Various
   - **Purpose:** Migration guides, handoff docs
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `coderef-context/MIGRATION-TO-FILE-READER.md`

2. **AUDIT-*.md**, **ANALYSIS-*.md**
   - **Location:** Various
   - **Purpose:** Analysis reports, audit findings
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Various

3. **COMPLETION-*.md**, **SUMMARY-*.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/workorder/{feature}/`
   - **Purpose:** Feature completion summaries
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Various

**Characteristics:**
- Created during workorders
- Should have workorder_id in frontmatter
- Often temporary/one-time use

---

### Category 9: Infrastructure Docs

**Purpose:** File trees, inventories, indexes

**Created By:** Scripts + agents

**Document Types:**

1. **FILE-TREE.md**
   - **Location:** Project root or `docs/`
   - **Purpose:** Directory structure visualization
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/user/FILE-TREE.md`

2. **INVENTORY-*.md**
   - **Location:** `coderef/user/`
   - **Purpose:** Component/tool inventories
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** `papertrail/coderef/user/VALIDATOR-INVENTORY.md`

3. **INDEX.md**, **README.md** (indexes)
   - **Location:** Various directories
   - **Purpose:** Directory contents index
   - **Current Frontmatter:** ‚ùå None
   - **Validator:** ‚ùå None
   - **Example:** Various

**Characteristics:**
- Auto-generated or semi-auto
- Should have agent, date, task frontmatter
- Frequently updated

---

## Summary: Document Type Coverage

| Category | Document Types | Current Frontmatter | Validator | Priority |
|----------|----------------|---------------------|-----------|----------|
| **Foundation Docs** | 5 types (README, ARCHITECTURE, API, SCHEMA, COMPONENTS) | UDS (workorder-based) | ‚ùå None | üî¥ HIGH |
| **Workorder Docs** | 5 types (context.json, analysis.json, plan.json, execution-log.json, DELIVERABLES.md) | Mixed (plan.json has schema) | ‚ö†Ô∏è Partial (plan.json only) | üî¥ HIGH |
| **Resource Sheets** | 1 type ({Component}-RESOURCE-SHEET.md) | RSMS v2.0 | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ DONE |
| **Standards Docs** | 4+ types (global-standards, resource-sheet-standards, etc.) | ‚ùå None | ‚ùå None | üü° MEDIUM |
| **User-Facing Docs** | 3+ types (USER-GUIDE, TUTORIAL, HOW-TO) | ‚ùå None | ‚ùå None | üü¢ LOW |
| **System Docs** | 3 types (CLAUDE.md, SESSION-INDEX.md, workorder-log.txt) | ‚ùå None | ‚ùå None | üü° MEDIUM |
| **Session Docs** | 2 types (communication.json, instructions.json) | JSON metadata | ‚ö†Ô∏è Partial (communication.json only) | üü° MEDIUM |
| **Migration/Audit Docs** | 3+ types (MIGRATION, AUDIT, COMPLETION) | ‚ùå None | ‚ùå None | üü¢ LOW |
| **Infrastructure Docs** | 3+ types (FILE-TREE, INVENTORY, INDEX) | ‚ùå None | ‚ùå None | üü¢ LOW |

---

## Total Document Types Identified: 30+

**By Format:**
- Markdown: ~20 types
- JSON: ~10 types
- Plain text: 1 type (workorder-log.txt)

**Validation Coverage:**
- ‚úÖ Fully Validated: 2 types (resource sheets, plan.json)
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Partially Validated: 3 types (communication.json, execution-log.json, instructions.json)
- ‚ùå Not Validated: 25+ types

---

## Next Steps for UDS System

1. **Define UDS Hierarchy**
   - Base UDS (agent, date, task) - ALL markdown files
   - Type-specific extensions (workorder-based, resource-based, etc.)

2. **Create Schemas**
   - foundation-doc-frontmatter-schema.json
   - workorder-doc-frontmatter-schema.json
   - general-markdown-frontmatter-schema.json
   - system-doc-frontmatter-schema.json

3. **Create Validators**
   - foundation_docs.py (validates 5 foundation doc types)
   - workorder_docs.py (validates context, analysis, DELIVERABLES)
   - general_markdown.py (validates all other .md files)

4. **Migration**
   - Add frontmatter to all existing docs
   - Run validators
   - Update coderef-docs to enforce UDS

---

**Maintained by:** Papertrail
**Date:** 2026-01-10
